subject: JUnit is unable to find the Testclasses
msgSnippet: Hi, we are doing our first steps with Junit and are trying to start tests from the command prompt using the graphical TestRunner. Junit keeps telling us that
messageBody:
Hi,
we are doing our first steps with Junit and are trying to start tests from
the command prompt using the graphical TestRunner. Junit keeps telling us
that he is unable to find the test classes.

Does it has anything to do with setting the classpath right, or could it be
a problem with the TestClass itself. The tests that come with the JUnit
distribution are found without any problems. Any suggestions?

Michael
